Question: When **** proposed the army march on the capital, his marshals decided to mutiny.
Hints: This person arrived in Paris on 20 March and governed for a period now called the Hundred Days.
The Peninsular War and 1812 French invasion of Russia marked turning points in this person's fortunes.
On completion of his studies at Brienne in 1784, this person was admitted to the elite École Militaire in Paris.
